question: hi
answer:
The Active Orders section shows your currently processing orders. You can see the order details, restaurant, items ordered, delivery status, and estimated delivery time. 😊

The Hold Orders section within Active Orders displays orders that are temporarily paused. This could be due to various reasons, such as awaiting clarification from the customer or issues with the restaurant. You can manage these orders from there. 👍

Managing your sub-domain allows you to customize your FoodChow restaurant page. This includes things like your restaurant's name, logo, and even menu descriptions. More details are unavailable at this time. Please contact support if you need further assistance. 📞 Phone: 9979619136 📧 Email: support@foodchow.com

The Promo Codes & Coupons section lets you manage and create promotional offers for your restaurant. You can add new codes, view existing ones, and track their usage. This helps attract customers and boost sales. ✨

question: how to add item ?
answer:
To add an item, you'll need to find the item on the FoodChow app or website. Once you locate it, you can usually add it to your cart by clicking "Add to Cart" or a similar button. 😊
For more detailed instructions, please specify where you are trying to add the item (e.g., the FoodChow app, restaurant website, POS system). This will help me guide you better! 👍
